targets.expr:
(
  sum  (kubelet_volume_stats_capacity_bytes{cluster="$cluster", job="kubelet", namespace="$namespace",service!="prometheus-prometheus-oper-kubelet"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim) 
  -
  sum  (kubelet_volume_stats_available_bytes{cluster="$cluster", job="kubelet", namespace="$namespace",service!="prometheus-prometheus-oper-kubelet"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim) 
)
